properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I am so glad that our
Father in heaven
Tells of his love in the book
He has given
Wonderful things in the bible I see
This is the dearest that
Jesus loves me;

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I am so glad that Jesus loves me
Jesus loves me, Jesus loves me
I am so glad that Jesus loves me
Jesus loves even me;

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tho' I forget him and wander away
Still he doth love me wherever I stray
Back to his dear loving arms
Would I flee
When I remember that
Jesus loves me;

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh, if there's only one song I can sing
When in his beauty I see
The great king
This shall my song in eternity be
Oh, what a wonder that
Jesus loves me;
